pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Currently works only with SBCL to add support to other CL implementations modify LAMBDALIST function in src/generator.lisp file
USAGE: Call api-gen function to generate HTML API. Evenually redefine *api-css* before calling api-gen.
http://common-lisp.net/project/cl-api/index.shtml To generate an API document, you simply call API-GEN function passing the symbol package you want to document and the destination path. Optionally you might want to excplute some symbol to be documented for a specific section, this is what :EXCLUDE-CONST :EXCLUDE-VAR :EXCLUDE-CLASS :EXCLUDE-COND :EXCLUDE-FUNC :EXCLUDE-MACRO API-GEN keys are meant for.
